title: $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror-mode-markdown
author: tiddlywiki
name: CodeMirror Mode Markdown
readme: This plugin adds Syntax Highlighting for Markdown tiddlers (text/x-markdown) to the [[CodeMirror|http://codemirror.net]] text editor. It needs the latest [[CodeMirror plugin|$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror]] to be installed
